{"id":926292354,"question_id":2724,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1680403794,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/926292354/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Convert an Array Into a 2D Array With Conditions","memory":"29.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    map<int, int> m;\n    vector<vector<int>> findMatrix(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<vector<int>> ans;\n        for(int i: nums) m[i]++;\n        for(auto [k, v]: m){\n            if(ans.size() < v) ans.resize(v);\n            for(int i = 0; i < v; i++){\n                ans[i].push_back(k);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"convert-an-array-into-a-2d-array-with-conditions","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
